GIT_REPO_URL.description: The git URL of your crates index repository.

DB_POOL_SIZE.description: The maximum number of database connections managed by the pool. Set so that this value times the number of dynos is less than your connection limit.

DB_MIN_IDLE.description: The pool will try to maintain at least this many idle connections at all times, while respecting the maximum size of the pool.

DB_HELPER_THREADS.description: The number of threads that the pool will use for asynchronous operations such as connection creation and health checks.
